TypeSignature.Value: public class FlowDocumentScrollViewer : System.Windows.Controls.Control, IServiceProvider, System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
.class public auto ansi FlowDocumentScrollViewer extends System.Windows.Controls.Control implements class System.IServiceProvider, class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class FlowDocumentScrollViewer Inherits Control Implements IAddChild, IServiceProvider
public ref class FlowDocumentScrollViewer : System::Windows::Controls::Control, IServiceProvider, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild
type FlowDocumentScrollViewer = class inherit Control interface IAddChild interface IServiceProvider

summary.span: Provides a control for viewing flow content in a continuous scrolling mode.

span.span: Provides a control for viewing flow content in a continuous scrolling mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示的内容以连续滚动模式。 shows content in continuous scrolling mode. 类似的控件， ，以一次一页上查看模式显示内容。A similar control, , shows content in page-at-a-time viewing mode. 这两和都固定使用特定查看模式。Both and are fixed to a particular viewing mode. 但是，包括功能，让用户能够动态选择各种查看模式 (由提供枚举)，但代价是比更大权重或。On the other hand, includes features that enable the user to dynamically choose between various viewing modes (as provided by the enumeration), at the cost of being heavier weight than or . 下图显示控件及其默认[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。The following figure shows a control with its default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. ![屏幕快照： 基本 FlowDocumentScrollViewer](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-main.png "屏幕快照： 基本 FlowDocumentScrollViewer")![Screenshot: Basic FlowDocumentScrollViewer](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-main.png "Screenshot: Basic FlowDocumentScrollViewer") 默认情况下，总是显示垂直滚动条，而水平滚动条则在需要时显示。By default, a vertical scrollbar is always shown, and a horizontal scrollbar becomes visible if needed. 默认值[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]有关不包括工具栏; 但是，属性可以用于启用内置工具栏。The default [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] for does not include a toolbar; however, the property can be used to enable a built-in toolbar. 是唯一允许的子元素。 is the only allowable child element for a . 一个元素只能承载不超过一个。A element may host no more than one . ## Examples 下面的示例定义在上图中所示。The following example defines the pictured in the figure above. [!code-xaml[FloaterFigureSnippets#_FlowDocumentScrollViewerXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FloaterFigureSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumentscrollviewerxaml)]

summary.span: Toggles the **Find** dialog.

span.span: Toggles the **Find** dialog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，按 Ctrl + F 的键盘快捷方式提供用于切换**查找**对话框。By default, Ctrl+F provides a keyboard shortcut for toggling the **Find** dialog. 下图显示**查找**上的对话框具有默认 UI。The following figure shows the **Find** dialog on a with default UI. ![屏幕快照： FlowDocumentScrollViewer 查找对话框](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-find.png "屏幕快照： FlowDocumentScrollViewer 查找对话框")![Screenshot: FlowDocumentScrollViewer find dialog](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-find.png "Screenshot: FlowDocumentScrollViewer find dialog") 默认值**查找**对话框包含一个用于输入搜索文本字段，以及用于按钮**查找下一步**，**查找上一个**，和**选项**.The default **Find** dialog includes a field for entering search text, as well as buttons for **Find Next**, **Find Previous**, and **Options**. 以下**查找**默认情况下提供选项：The following **Find** options are provided by default: - 全字匹配Match whole word only - 区分大小写Match case - 区分音调符号Match diacritic - 匹配 kashidaMatch kashida - 匹配 alef hamzaMatch alef hamza

span.span: Arguments of the event.

summary.span: Invoked whenever an unhandled routed event reaches this class in its route.

span.span: Invoked whenever an unhandled routed event reaches this class in its route.

summary.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 继承中的中间类已经实现了此方法的情况下，仍应调用基实现。You should still call the base implementation in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method. 此方法的目的是某种程度上类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 On \* 方法： 它提供了方法来处理从派生类的类处理程序而不是实例处理程序匹配的事件。The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下匹配事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为路由的事件可能由子元素，不一定是将调用处理程序，因此您的实现将需要使事件参数的源的元素引发将属性转换为帐户 （和不应尝试重新引发该事件在大多数情况下）。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will need to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 子类无法选择路由收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Subclasses of could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 一个可能的方案是采用的事件自变量并谨慎地将事件标记为已处理。One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Print() cil managed

summary.span: Invokes a standard **Print** dialog which can be used to print the contents of the and configure printing preferences.

span.span: Invokes a standard **Print** dialog which can be used to print the contents of the and configure printing preferences.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]不提供**打印**按钮。The default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] does not provide a **Print** button. 下图显示了一种标准的示例**打印**对话框。The following figure shows an example of a standard **Print** dialog. 请注意，特定的外观**打印**对话框可能会有所不同，具体取决于托管计算机的配置。Note that the specific appearance of the **Print** dialog may vary depending on the hosting computer's configuration. ![屏幕快照: 打印对话框](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "屏幕截图: 打印对话框")![Screenshot: Print dialog box](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "Screenshot: Print dialog box")

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取用户选定中的文本。The following example shows how to get the text that a user has selected in the . span.span: Gets or sets the brush that highlights the selected text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以指定突出显示中的所选的文本的画笔通过设置和属性。You can specify the brush that highlights selected text in a by setting the and properties. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，设置属性设置为 pink，并设置属性设置为 0.7。The following example creates a , sets the property to pink, and sets the property to 0.7. span.span: Gets or sets the opacity of the .

value.span: 不透明度。

span.span: The opacity of the .

value.span: 默认值为 0.4。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您设置为 0，是透明的并且不可见。If you set the to 0, the is transparent and is not visible. 如果您设置为 1.0，不透明，所选文本不可见。If you set the to 1.0, the is opaque and the selected text is not visible. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，设置属性设置为 pink，并设置属性设置为 0.7。The following example creates a , sets the property to pink, and sets the property to 0.7. summary.span: Gets or sets the current zoom level.

span.span: Gets or sets the current zoom level.

value.span: 当前缩放级别，以百分比表示。

span.span: The current zoom level, interpreted as a percentage.

value.span: 默认值为 100.0 （缩放级别为 100%）。

span.span: The default is 100.0 (a zoom level of 100%).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缩放级别约束的值和属性。The zoom level is constrained by the values of the and properties. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性。The following example shows how to set the attribute. summary.span: Gets or sets the zoom increment.

span.span: Gets or sets the zoom increment.

value.span: 当前缩放增量，以百分比表示。

span.span: The current zoom increment, interpreted as a percentage.

value.span: 默认值为 10.0 （缩放增量为 10%）。

span.span: The default is 10.0 (zoom increments by 10%).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缩放增量为依据的百分比级别增加或减少时或执行命令，分别。The zoom increment is the percentage by which the level is increased or decreased when the or commands are executed, respectively. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性。The following example shows how to set the attribute.
